title: As a user, I want to see a player's years of Minor League service
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Add a new batch called "Minor League Service Years" under the Player Profile section
- When the batch is run, the batch should give a Minor League Service year for each player, for each year that they have earned at least 30 days of minor league service at any minor league level of play.
- This updated value should be shown in the player profile secondary header, as well the Minor League service section the Service tab. 
- It should also be updated on the Rosters widget

**Batch - General AC**
- The batch should be available to run in Test, Report and Update mode
- Batch can be run on specific player ID
- Batch results shows listing of impacted Player IDs, Name, Org, Club, Roster status
- Batch should match other batches in look and feel and global functionality

title: As a User, I want to see if a player has had a DL exclusion year
custom_steps:
**AC**
- As part of the "Minor League Service years batch", system should also calculate if any players should have their MN DL exclusion status set to 'yes'
- If a player is on the DL for the entire season, and his MN DL exclusion is not already set to yes, then update this value to yes.
- This value should be reflected on the qualification register report

Qualifying DL roster statuses are:
7 Day Concussion DL (MJ)
10 Day DL (MJ)
60 Day DL (MJ and MN)
7 Day DL (MN)
Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL 
Rehab 10 Day DL 
Rehab 60 Day DL
Rehab 7 Day DL

title: As a user, I want players with less that 20 days on Option to get their service refunded
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Add this logic to the Options Tracking Batch

Batch Logic:
- If player has less than 20 options days, then the system must refund any accrued option days as MJ Service days
- Populate the results "Days refunded" column

title: As a user, I want to see if a player is eligible for a fourth option
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Add this logic to the Options Tracking Batch


Batch Logic:
- If the player has reached 3 of 3 options this season AND if the player has fewer than 5 seasons of service, then award the player a fourth option. Therefore, the player will now have 3 of 4 options used.
- If the player is at 3 of 4 options and already has 5 or more seasons of service, and did not use an option this year, then the fourth option year must be removed and field reverts to "3 of 3"

title: As a club, I want baseball info returned for a player ID
custom_steps:

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Feed+Requirements%3A+Pro+Player+Profile

- Fields listed on the linked wiki under Baseball Info section should be added to the API
- Data in the response must exactly match data on the UI in the player profile header
- For tables such as Rookie Career Development, and Acquisition Info, data in all rows and columns must be available in the API
- Response should be returned under 2 seconds

title: As a club, I want Contact Info returned for a player ID for players in my Org or FAs

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Feed+Requirements%3A+Pro+Player+Profile

**AC**
- Fields listed on the linked wiki under Contact Information section should be added to the API

Players Current Org is the logged in club 
OR The logged in API credential is a BOC API
OR The Player has no current Org
- Data should be encrypted
- Data in the response must exactly match data on the UI in the player profile header

- Response should be returned under 2 seconds

title: As a user, I want to see how many Options a player has available and has used
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Add a new batch under the 'Player profile' section called "Track Options"

Player Population:
- All Players who have available Options and have at least one Option day this season

Batch Logic:
- If a player has 20 or more MJ options days during the season, then the system should count this toward an option used. Update the value in Player profile "Options Used" and "Years Charged" fields

Results:
- In the Batch Results section of the batch, show the following columns
-- Player ID
-- Player Name
-- Options Used
-- Years Charged
-- Service Days refunded
- List all players from the initial Player population in results

title: As a user, I want to see a player's Foreign and Domestic service years in the Qualification Register report
custom_steps:
**AC**
- As part of the "Minor League Service Years batch, two additional types of service years are independently calculated . The player is granted a foreign or domestic service year for each year with at least 30 days of minor league service in the qualifying levels of play
- Foreign Service Years â€“ The level of play for the minor league service days were either VSL or DSL
- Domestic Service Years â€“ The level of play for the minor league service days was anything other than VSL/DSL
- The updated Foreign and Domestic Service year values should be reflected when the "Qualification Register Report" is run

title: UAT feedback: Updates to Assignment Clause UI
custom_steps:
**Updated Wireframe:**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=assignment_clause

**Link to Updated Data Discovery**
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-2014+Addendum+B+-+Non+1st+yr#EBIS4-TXT-2014AddendumB-Non1styr-AssignmentClause

**AC**

- Bring Assignment Clause in line with updated wireframe and Data Discovery by adding remaining columns and updating column header titles
- Multiple rows can be added
- 'Custom' can be selected as an option in which case the text is printed as is without a table
- For 'Club Response, Notification period and Decision Period' columns, if "Other" is chosen, also display a free type field where user can enter a number value
- Note that Bus rule 5.42 (#145355691) should only apply to the value in Column 1 "Assignor Roster Type"
- Change Bus rule 5.42 to Override for both Club and BOC

title: As a club, I want documentation on all available PPP API functions
custom_steps:
**AC**
- There should be documentation available for clubs to use the Ebis 2 API with the available queries and other information for them to get started

title: As a club, I want to see the correct MN contract years for a player
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Add a new batch called "Minor League Contract years and Last Club info" to the Player profile section of batches page
- Batch is run nightly  for all players and on demand for all players or specific player IDs.

Batch logic:
- MN Contract years should be calculated as part of the nightly Minor League Service batch
- If player has at least 1 day of MN service in the current season, then the current year counts as a Contract Year and the player's tally can go up.
- Update the "Minor Lg Contract years" field on the service tab of the player profile, secondary header and Rosters widget
- Additionally, also check and update the back-end fields "Minor League Last Club" and Minor League Last year played" information if player was moved to the Minors or to a different LOP in the minors.

Issue noted in the following jira should be fixed historically and moving forward

https://jira.boc.mlb.com:8443/browse/EBISII-11507

title: As a user, I want to know if this season counted towards a player's Seasons of Service
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Add a new batch under the 'Player profile' section called "Seasons of Service"
- When this batch is run, the first step is to check if the current year season counts as a season of service toward fourth option

**Player population:**
- Any player who has had at least one day of Major or Minor league service
- Exclude any players who have "No longer eligible" under Seasons of Service

**Batch calculation**
- Once the player has 90 qualifying days for that season, of which the first 30 must not include DL statuses, then that season counts as a season of service for options.  
- Only look at each affiliate's start and end date. If moved through different clubs, we are looking at whether that affiliate was in season  on that day
- Qualifying roster statuses are MJ status of "Active", or MN Status of "Active"
- Once player has reached the required 30 active days, then include both active and DL statuses. Qualifying DL statuses are:
7 Day Concussion DL (MJ)
10 Day DL (MJ)
60 Day DL (MJ and MN)
7 Day DL (MN)
Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL
Rehab 10 Day DL
Rehab 60 Day DL
Rehab 7 Day DL
- If the season counts as a season of service, add the year to the comma separated list under the "UNOFFICIAL seasons of service towards 4th option" option field under the "Waivers and Transactions" tab
- If player has 5 years listed, then add a note to the field after the last year " - No longer eligible"
- Only calculate current year. Do not recalculate prior years

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from creating an Add D if player is missing an Active MNC
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Bus rule 30.4 - Player must have an Active Minor Contract. If not, show a hard error for clubs and override for BOC.
- Rule is on run onCreate. User cannot proceed to the create Addendum D form without passing this rule
- Error message: Player does not have an active minor league contract

title: As Club/BOC, I want to ensure only authorized users have access to Add D
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Users must have MNC Admin permissions to create, edit, submit and approve addendum Ds.
- Users must have MNC Ready Only permissions to view Addendum Ds
- Users without MNC permissions cannot create or view Addendum Ds

title: As BOC, I want an Addendum D to get stamped on Approval
custom_steps:
**AC**
- When BOC user approves an Addendum D from the Clipboard or from  the Addendum D form, the Commissioners stamp and signature must get added to the attached file labelled 'Addendum D' on reaching approval state.
- User should be able to open the attached PDF and view the stamp on approved Addendum Ds
- User can reattach a file to an approved Addendum D with the Add D label. If so, the new file should get restamped on Save.

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from trading during the trade closed period
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Add a new system date to the System dates screen under Baseball Ops > General, called "Trade Close Period"
- The field should allow entry of a Start and End date as well as start time and end time. It should not allow invalid values
- The value should be populated with 09/21 12.00 pm to 10/1 11.59 pm for the current year and next 10 years
- Add a new business rule to Trades (bus rule 1.31) - If current date is on or between system date/time  "Trade Close period", 
OR
if the transaction date is AFTER the start date but on or before the End date,
show hard error to clubs and override to BOC
- Rule should run on creation and on all state changes
- Error message: Per MLR 9(b), no contract of a Major or Minor League player shall be traded during the period commencing at [Start time] ET on (Closed Period Start Date) and ending upon the day following (Closed Period End Date).

title: As a user, I want to see historical Addendum D's in ebis 2
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Any Addendum D's in ebis 1 should be migrated and viewable in ebis 2
- Addendum Ds data should be correct and match ebis 1 on both Contract History and the form
- Attachments should also be migrated and labelled with "Addendum D" in ebis 2
- Addendum D's can be searched through Advanced Search using the 'Minor Contract contains Addendum D' filter

title: UAT Feedback: Incentive bonus to use last play off date
custom_steps:
**AC**
- When calculating logic for Incentive bonus batch (#142358175 and  #142358591), use the 'last play off date' value in System dates as opposed to the End of Season date. If player has a qualifying roster status during the post-season, those days should get credited toward earning IBP

Note:
Please pre-populate the last play off date column for current year and next 10 years with the same value as End of season date. Baseball Ops will update the values as clubs qualify for the post season playoffs

title: UAT Feedback:  Add additional PPP API parameters
custom_steps:
**AC**
Add the following parameters to the PPP API calls
-	Allplayers and Update calls - Ability to set a limit and offset less than 1000
-	Allplayers and Update calls - Add a parameter to call for players on a Major or Minor League Roster
-	Update call - Include time in from/to date for updates

title: As a club, I want to set up Addendum D signatories
custom_steps:
**Wireframe:**
http://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=authorized_signatory_negotiator

**AC**
- Add an "Add D" column to the right of the Add C column on the  Signatories and Negotiators widget
- Signatories who have this column checked should appear in the Addendum D signatory drop down on Addendum D
- When printing the Addendum D, the selected signatory name and title should appear in PDF
- Users can add new signatories for Add D directly from the form

title: As BOC, I want to approve Addendum D's
custom_steps:
**Addendum D Stateflow**
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-4606+Add+D+Stateflow

**AC**
- Club can Submit the Addendum D to BOC via the submit button. This will update status to "Pending Approval" and reload the form
- Submitted Add Ds will appear on BOC clipboard for approval
- BOC can approve the Addendum D from the Clipboard or by opening the form and clicking on "Approve". This will update status to "Approved"
- BOC can also choose to "Reject" the Addendum C which moves it to Reject State. The Delete button is available in Rejected state
- Club can only edit Add D in Preliminary. BOC can edit in all states except Approved.
- BOC can attach files in "Approved State"
- Once Add D is Pending, show in green in Player history. Turn to black once approved

title: As BOC, I want to see which Addendum Cs don't count toward free agency based on player not having any service
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Add a new batch called "Exclude Add C from FA" under the Minor Contracts section
- When the batch is run, find all players who have a currently active MNC (Terms accepted, Pre-approved, Approved, Update Terms Accepted, Pending Investigation) and have at least one current year Addendum C that counts toward Free Agency
- For each player, check if he had MN service at any point during the current year. If no MN service was accrued the entire year, then any Addendum C's for this year should be flagged as not counting toward Free Agency
- In Contract History, the "Count FA" column should no longer increment these excluded Addendum Cs. For example if the Add was previously incrementing 6/7, then it should be changed to blank. The next subsequent valid Addendum C for the following year will now be 6/7.
- Any excluded Addendum Cs should display the note "Contract year voided - does not count towards Free Agency" under the Status and Dates section of the Addendum C

**Batch - General AC**
- The batch should be available to run in Test, Report and Update mode
- Batch can be run on specific player ID
- Batch results shows listing of impacted Player IDs, Name, Org, Club, Roster status
- Batch should match other batches in look and feel and global functionality

title: Club/BOC can print an Add D
Club cannot create Add D for player in another ORG
Assignment Clause story
